Articles.Content: ouch.... on think I am hopeing to add is a dynamic failyer so that your early tests are more likely to go wring... so that you see why you really should test your rockets before you put a man on them

Fixed launch clamps.

They work just like the stock ones, only they look a little more FASA like.

Umbilicals are next...

Fixed launch clamps.

They work just like the stock ones, only they look a little more FASA like.

Umbilicals are next...

The scorches on the inner side of the clamps, where they're not really visible until after launch, is a nice touch.

The scorches on the inner side of the clamps, where they're not really visible until after launch, is a nice touch.

*looks at the pictures again...*

Whoa... That's a VERY nice touch!
I like how the inside of the clamps looks scorched. Nice little touch.
These will be excellent additions. Outstanding work, frizzank!

The scorches on the inner side of the clamps, where they're not really visible until after launch, is a nice touch.

Now that, my friends, is what we call "attention to detail."

Finished the Umbilicals, they provide resources for your rocket, fuel mono and electricity. Combined with the tweakables you could put an empty rocket on the pad and then fill it up with fuel and kerbals.

I will post a link sometime today for the whole update. After I am done tweaking the values.

Does anyone know what the command is to make a particle fx play on load. There is running, activate and a few others, but I couldn't find one that would do it on load. I want to have some gasses leaking out of the hoses while its sitting on the pad.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Finished the Umbilicals, they provide resources for your rocket, fuel mono and electricity. Combined with the tweakables you could put an empty rocket on the pad and then fill it up with fuel and kerbals.

I will post a link sometime today for the whole update. After I am done tweaking the values.

That

That is AMAZING!!!! Oh, you spelled umbilicals wrong in the album title.

Frizzank, why are your mods so, amazing? Also, cannot wait for the launchtower.

Again, also. Will you be doing Skylab? Or the proposed MOLAB?

That

That is AMAZING!!!! Oh, you spelled umbilicals wrong in the album title.

Yes well that happens a lot with me. Im sure there are more goodies like that in this update...

I want to have some gasses leaking out of the hoses while its sitting on the pad.

Dude, you're awesome. I am never going without your pack again!
When is the next release?

When is the next release?

We all are just going to pretend that you got overexcited about the umbilicals, clamps and launchtower and forgot one never ever asks when a mod is going to be released. Just bad form, old boy. Now apologize to frizzank and wait like the rest of us. And remember, no good mod before its time.
Sometime today, maybe tommorow if you're not in Frizzank's time zone.
This just keeps looking better and better. Not everyone might care for the Gemini or the Mercury parts, but this launch tower system is so universally awesome people will get it just for that.
2 hours from now I will post a link for a pre-release for testing.
Cool. Thank you much for these masterpieces, Frizzank.

2 hours from now I will post a link for a pre-release for testing.

Only one hour, 55 minutes!

That tower is looking just awesome!!

Also just want to say, I for one am really looking forward to Apollo parts in the future. Your Mercury and Gemini parts are perfect kerbalized analogs of the NASA counterparts imo.
How modular will that tower be? Will it strictly be for that specific rocket?
That tower looks awesome (as usual) frizzank!

*Drops her corned beef sandwich and ohhhs at the launch tower! then meeps looking for her sandwich. * I LOVE THAT TOWER can not wait to test it out, That would be a GREAT addition to the launch pad at The Mass Key Shipyards rocket facility. I look forward to trying it out once you leak a test version. *Noms on the newly found sandwich and sitars at the picture of the tower! " ooooooohhhhhhhhh (think little green alien's from toy story.)
The TOOOOWWWEEEERRRRRR!!!!!

The towers works just like the stock clamps as far as placement goes. If you do put it too far off angle it looks a little weird...

Please post bugs as you find them, If all goes well I will update the spaceport download in a few days. I still need to update most of the craft files but you can still play with this until then.

3.7 Added launch tower, Redstone 1.25m Clamp and 2.5m Clamp, Atlas Radial Clamp, and Umbilical Tower.

If your rocket "Pops" on load to the pad and is off center. Reload your scene and it will fix it.

Added Stackable Equipment Part.

Added Mercury RCS thruster.

Added "Fairing" and "Cargo Bay" to part titles for FAR support.

Mercury Pod has RCS thruster part now, no more reaction wheel on the pod.

Increased Gemini LES thrust to 250.

Agena Antenna now weighs the same as other antenna's and science parts to make weight balancing easier.

Removed surface attach from Agena Docking.

Moved the MOL equipment to utility.

Fixed LR-91 Mini FX bug

Fixed Gemini Legs from falling through the ground and animation bug on white ones.

Increased Agena engine to 65. Decreased ISP to 395. Increased the mass to .45

Increased Agena FP Mono engine to 20. Increased ISP 415, makes a great interplanetary mono thruster now.

Increased the mass of mercury's parachute, now same as stock one. Helps with weirdness.

http://www./download/kpwljb4lzp4aa50/FASA3.70.zip

Edited January 20, 2014 by frizzank
